name: Prohibition On Tap
description:
Run a speakeasy and experience the prohibition era in this "Root Beer Tapper" inspired game!

Serve drinks to as many customers as possibly to collect money, but make sure you don't miss a customer, and don't serve the undercover police or you'll be arrested for illegally selling liquor!

Space - Serve Drink / Select

Up and Down - Move

Escape - Pause

Also Keep an eye out for 4 musicians that will be coming. Not only will you make more money by serving them a drink, but you'll also get them to play some music to add some rhythm and fun to your speakeasy!

Credits:
